sections.heading: of action.Court action under the provisions of sections 48-1219 to 48-1227 may be commenced no later than four years after the cause of action accrues

sections.text:
48-1224.Limitation of action.

Court action under the provisions of sections 48-1219 to 48-1227 may be commenced no later than four years after the cause of action accrues.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 389, ยง 6, p. 1369.
